function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Psychological distress due to mass home-confinement directives, including stress, depression, irritability, insomnia, fear, confusion, anger, frustration, boredom, and stigma associated with quarantine.","Impact":"Persistent emotional outcomes, potential long-term mental health issues, and decreased well-being.","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support, access to counseling, and promote social connections within confinement measures.","Technologies":"Telemedicine, online counseling platforms, mental health apps, and virtual social interaction tools.","People":"General population under home-confinement directives, including individuals, families, and communities.","Owner":"Government agencies, healthcare providers, mental health professionals."},{"Description":"Intensified distress due to conflicting messages, differences among stay-at-home orders, and conflicting messages from government and public health authorities.","Impact":"Increased confusion, anxiety, and reduced compliance with quarantine measures.","Mitigation":"Clear and consistent communication, transparent information sharing, and coordination among public health authorities and government agencies.","Technologies":"Communication platforms, information sharing tools, and data management systems.","People":"General population under stay-at-home orders, affected individuals, and healthcare workers.","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies, and communication experts."},{"Description":"Temptation to violate quarantine orders due to emotional distress and motivation to comply with quarantine.","Impact":"Increased risk of infecting others and undermining the effectiveness of quarantine measures.","Mitigation":"Provide psychological support, access to mental health counseling and resources, and effective communication of the importance of compliance.","Technologies":"Telemedicine, online counseling platforms, and communication tools for disseminating information.","People":"Community members affected by quarantine, individuals under quarantine orders, and healthcare workers.","Owner":"Public health authorities, community leaders, and healthcare providers."}]}
